After: Screenshot-2022-02-20-at-03.04.31.png
The warning doesn't disappear after removing the tag and even after adding a valid tag the warning still shows. I feel that after removing the tag the warning should also disappear.
@Tim Abbott @Alya Abbott may you look into this?

This would perhaps be nice to change but I don't think it's particularly important and it's kinda annoying to change, in that one needs to re-parse what you have in the compose box every time you change its content, which can lead to quadratic work when typing (which is maybe OK when a notice is present, but certainly not something we want in general).
(I think this sort of implementation detail would be better in #feedback or #issues than #design, BTW)
Thanks for the input and yeah i'll take care about it in the future. :+1:
